name: Police Chase for Windows
description:
Download Police Chase for Windows !

Special Offer - Free for everyone :))

Features

* Ads free for a complete experience
* 9 configured vehicles ready to use !,
* New City Scene !
* Complete UI dashboard with mobile controllers,
* Keyboard controller, Mobile controller, Xbox controller, and Logitech Steering Wheel support, just go over to options menu and choose your preferred one.
* Record & Replay, Enter & Exit, Lighting, Camera modes, Behaviors, Customization, and more...
* Variable ground physics,
* Easy to play, vehicles can be customized on headlight colors, tires, wheel colors and more..
* Functional Dashboard,
* Gas Stations to fill out petrol,
* Different types of driving assistants to aid you in driving the vehicles,
* Vehicle Repair
* Airplanes and airport
* 4 Different mobile controllers, UI BUTTONS, ACCELEROMETER, STEERING WHEEL, JOYSTICK,
* Realistic Graphics
* Vehicle Damage AI
* Planes
* And More...

Download the Demo to Find out the features

Free Android Version Available at - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.RayGames.PoliceChase
